author: Special Correspondent
text:
Satish Kumar Mittal, Commissioner of Railway Safety, Southern Circle, Bengaluru, will inspect the new second broadgauge line laid between Ariyalur and Mathur railway stations on March 21.

He will conduct a high-speed trial run travelling on board a special train in the second BG line on the same day.

The high speed trial run will be conducted between 3 p.m. and 6 p.m., a Southern Railway press release here said.
title: Safety Commissioner to inspect double line
